entry.title: Russian Strike Kills Four in Eastern Ukrainian City of Slovyansk
entry.content: Ukrainian officials said the latest deadly attack is part of a new Russian strategy to terrorize Ukraine into submission.

entry.title: Mines, Port Damage Threaten Revival of Sea Route for Ukraine Grain
entry.content: U.N.-sponsored talks are aimed at striking an agreement between Moscow and Kyiv to give shipments of Ukrainian grain safe passageâ€”but it could still take weeks, or even months, to get traffic moving again.

entry.title: Taliban Splits Emerge Over Religion, Power and Girls' Schools
entry.content: The Taliban stayed cohesive as a fighting force during the 20-year insurgency. Now cracks are appearing on multiple fronts.

entry.title: Xi Says Hong Kong's Loyalty to Beijing Will Ensure Prosperous Future
entry.content: Chinese leader Xi Jinping urged Hong Kong to show more patriotic fervor and rally around his vision of a strong and unified China as he prepares to extend his rule.
